greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Row sums of triangle A137855.
link: Andrew Howroyd, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..200
formula: a(n) = Sum_{k=1..n} Sum_{j=1..n-k+1} Stirling2(k, j). - _Andrew Howroyd_, Aug 09 2018
example: a(5) = 17 = sum of row 5 terms of triangle A137855: (1 + 2 + 5 + 8 + 1).
program: (PARI) a(n)={sum(k=1, n, sum(j=1, n-k+1, stirling(k,j,2)))} \\ _Andrew Howroyd_, Aug 09 2018
results.author: _Gary W. Adamson_, Feb 18 2008
ext: Terms a(12) and beyond from _Andrew Howroyd_, Aug 09 2018
